title: Enlarge gallery images further

requirements.text: In the Gallery page (frontend/src/views/GalleryView.tsx), increase the image dimensions in the artwork cards to make them significantly larger than the current size while maintaining the list layout with images filling their containers and titles displayed below within the same card
acceptanceCriteria: Images in the gallery list are noticeably larger than the previous version
Images fill their container width completely
Artwork titles remain positioned directly below each image within the same card
List layout is preserved with proper spacing between items

constraints: Do not change the list layout structure established in previous versions
Maintain the existing filtering and sold display mode functionality
Keep artwork titles below images within the same card component
nonGoals: Changing the gallery layout from list to grid
Adding new filtering or sorting options
Changing the backend artwork data structure
